Detailed Description

mgTLRects is a proprietry class for Face tessellation.

mgTLRects holds all the subdivided rectangles for the triangulation.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

mgTLRects::mgTLRects ( mgTLparameter &  param,
size_t  divnum = 4 
)
Parameters:
param Tessellation parameter. Point((u,v) of the face) array will be returned into param.m_points. mgTLRect's m_Pid[.] is the id of this points. points[m_Pid[.]] is the MGPosition data (u,v) of the face.
divnum Minimum number of the devided rectangles.

Member Function Documentation

size_t mgTLRects::add_point ( double  u,
double  v 
)

Add position data P into m_position.

Function's return value i is the id of the stored position. m_position[i] will be P.

bool mgTLRects::is_flat ( mgTLRect &  rect,
bool &  direction 
)

Test if surface of the rect is flat, that is, if within the tolerance.

When m_param.texture() is true, test if rect is within the texture tolerance and if so, the texture plane will be pushed back to m_texture_planes.

Parameters:
direction true: u-direction is more non flat. false: v-direction is more non flat.
